## üìñ Reading Order

### For New Users

1. [README.md](README.md) - Understand what DocRAG Kit is
2. [README.md](README.md) - Follow Quick Start guide
3. [EXAMPLES.md](EXAMPLES.md) - See examples for your project type
4. [MCP_INTEGRATION.md](MCP_INTEGRATION.md) - Connect to Kiro AI

### For Troubleshooting

1. [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](TROUBLESHOOTING.md) - Find your specific issue
2. [API_REFERENCE.md](API_REFERENCE.md) - Check command/config details
3. [MCP_INTEGRATION.md](MCP_INTEGRATION.md) - If MCP-related

### For Advanced Usage

1. [API_REFERENCE.md](API_REFERENCE.md) - Complete reference
2. [EXAMPLES.md](EXAMPLES.md) - Advanced configuration examples
3. [MCP_INTEGRATION.md](MCP_INTEGRATION.md) - Advanced MCP configuration

## üí° Tips

### Best Practices
- Read [SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md) before starting (protect your API keys!)
- Read [README.md](README.md) Security section before starting
- Follow [EXAMPLES.md](EXAMPLES.md) for your project type
- Keep [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](TROUBLESHOOTING.md) bookmarked for quick reference
- Use [API_REFERENCE.md](API_REFERENCE.md) to understand all options

### Getting Help
1. Check [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](TROUBLESHOOTING.md) first
2. Search [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/yourusername/docrag-kit/issues)
3. Review relevant documentation section
4. Open new issue with details from [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](TROUBLESHOOTING.md) "Getting Help" section

## üìù Documentation Maintenance

This documentation is maintained alongside the DocRAG Kit codebase. If you find errors or have suggestions:

1. Check if issue already exists
2. Open an issue or pull request
3. Include documentation file name and section
4. Suggest specific improvements
